verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhu bhāvāviṣṭa hañā
pralāpa karilā tat-tat śloka paḍiyā

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhāva-āviṣṭa hañā—being overwhelmed by ecstatic love; pralāpa karilā—said crazy words; tat-tat—appropriate; śloka paḍiyā—by reading the verse.
translation: Thus overwhelmed by ecstatic love, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu spoke like a madman and recited suitable verses.
